    StatsKit.jl

    This is a convenience meta-package which allows loading essential packages for statistics in one command:

    using StatsKit

    Currently this loads the Statistics standard library module, and the following packages:

    • Bootstrap
    • CategoricalArrays
    • Clustering
    • CSV
    • DataFrames
    • Distances
    • Distributions
    • GLM
    • HypothesisTests
    • KernelDensity
    • Loess
    • MultivariateStats
    • StatsBase
    • TimeSeries
